original_text: who, though he was in the form of God, did not count equality with God a thing to be grasped,
korean_text: 그는 근본 하나님의 본체시나 하나님과 동등됨을 취할 것으로 여기지 아니하시고

sentences.original_text: who, though he was in the form of God,
did not count equality with God a thing to be grasped,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 동등됨을 붙잡을 것으로 여기지 아니하시고,
